newsitem.title: USA: U.S. barge rates - Thinly quoted on call session.
newsitem.headline: U.S. barge rates - Thinly quoted on call session.

text.p: U.S. barge rates were lightly quoted on the St. Louis Merchants Exchange call session Wednesday. Two barges traded versus two barges on Tuesday.
- Two barges, Naples, Illinois River, on station, traded at 100 percent of tariff.
- Two barges, LaGrange, Missouri River, this week, bid 115 percent, no comparison, no offer.
- One barge, Memphis, Mississippi River, this week, no bid, offer 90 percent, unchanged, similar from July 14.
Two barges, Mid-Mississippi River, next week, bid 115 percent, unchanged, similar from Tuesday, no offer.
